title: pattern fill in indesign
content:
I'm sorry if this is out of place, but I can't find how to make a pattern fill in indesign. I was told to just paste in a filled shape from illustrator and it would automatically become a swatch, but that hasn't worked.

any help would be great, thanks!
author: elsac

comments.content:
Try Teacup's Pattermaker plugin for ID.

[http://www.teacupsoftware.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011012421/http:/www.teacupsoftware.com/ "http://www.teacupsoftware.com/")
